articles.title: Madhya Pradesh bye-elections: Voting underway in Mungaoli and Kolaras, EVM glitches reported
articles.description: Madhya Pradesh bye-election: Ahead of the Madhya Pradesh Assembly elections later this year, the bypolls are a litmus test for the Shivraj Singh Chouhan led BJP government in the state.
articles.author: Express Web Desk

articles.title: 2019 elections: BJP set to initiate ad campaign to showcase its success stories
articles.description: BJP is giving special attention to election states of Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Chattisgarh and Rajasthan.

articles.title: Opinion: BJP Delusional About Madhya Pradesh Result
articles.description: If BJP wants to rejoice in the margin of its defeat in the Madhya Pradesh by-elections, it can jolly well do that but only at its own peril.

articles.description: A delegation of Congress leaders from Madhya Pradesh met Chief Election Commissioner OP Rawat and urged him to take steps to ensure free and fair by-elections in the state, including transfer all officials with "dubious" track record The post Congress urges E…

articles.title: Madhya Pradesh bypolls: Jyotiraditya Scindia emerges as Congress’ young turk as Shivraj Singh Chouhan fails to read voters’ anger
articles.description: The Kolaras and Mungaoli bypolls in Madhya Pradesh may have helped Congress find a young Turk in Guna MP Jyotiraditya Scindia, who spearheaded the party’s election campaign against BJP The post Madhya Pradesh bypolls: Jyotiraditya Scindia emerges as Congress’…

articles.title: AAP Seeks Disqualification Of 116 BJP Lawmakers In Madhya Pradesh
articles.description: The Madhya Pradesh unit of Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) on Monday demanded that the Election Commission disqualify 116 BJP MLAs in the state for holding offices of profit, an allegation that has been dismissed by the ruling party.

articles.title: Madhya Pradesh Cabinet Expansion Likely Tomorrow
articles.description: Ahead of the Assembly elections which are due later this year, Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan is likely to reshuffle and expand his cabinet tomorrow, a senior official said.

articles.title: Madhya Pradesh Assembly Bypolls: Counting Of Votes Tomorrow
articles.description: The counting of votes for the Mungaoli and Kolaras Assembly by-polls in Madhya Pradesh will he held tomorrow, an Election Commission official said today.

articles.title: Madhya Pradesh announces sops for farmers in election year
articles.description: Terming it as his scheme aimed at increasing productivity, Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan said the farmers will be paid Rs 200 bonus on every quintal they sold to the government in the last rabi season.
articles.author: Milind Ghatwai

articles.title: Gujarat Needs Water. Madhya Pradesh Won't Allow It (Hint: Election)
articles.description: The BJP leadership has described the Narmada as the lifeline of Gujarat, but with its government in Madhya Pradesh at its most vulnerable in recent years, the competing claims over the river are starker and more consequential than ever before.

articles.title: Congress Alleges Discrepancies In Voters List In Madhya Pradesh
articles.description: The Congress on Monday complained to the Election Commission alleging discrepancies in the voters list in Madhya Pradesh ahead of by-elections in the state.

articles.title: Projecting CM face is Congress high command’s call, says Jyotiraditya Scindia
articles.description: A section of Congress leadership in Madhya Pradesh is demanding that the party declare its face for the election to take on CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan
articles.author: PTI
